<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> did <S%H5576>Sennacherib<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> (but he <S%H1931>himself<s%> laid siege <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4475>power<s%> with him,) to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that were at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> was there among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> that my <S%H1>fathers<s%> utterly <S%H2763>destroyed,<s%> that <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that your <S%H430>God<s%> should be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of my <S%H3027>hand?<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore let not <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5377>deceive<s%> you, <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H5496>persuade<s%> you on <S%H2063>this<s%> manner, <S%H408>neither<s%> yet <S%H539>believe<s%> him: for <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H433>god<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> or <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers:<s%> <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> less shall your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of my <S%H3027>hand?<s%>
